hero.title: F-BASIC Emulator
hero.subtitle: A modern web-based IDE for Family Basic programming language
hero.description: Experience the authentic F-BASIC development environment with modern web technologies. Write, execute, and debug Family Basic programs in your browser.

ide.title: Family Basic IDE
ide.description: Write and execute F-BASIC programs with real-time feedback, syntax highlighting, and debugging tools.

monaco.title: Monaco Editor
monaco.description: Advanced code editor with IntelliSense, syntax highlighting, and professional development features.

imageAnalyzer.title: Image Analyzer
imageAnalyzer.description: Analyze and inspect image files with detailed pixel information and color palette extraction.

spriteViewer.title: Sprite Viewer
spriteViewer.description: View and explore character sprites with animation controls, palette selection, and display options.

about.title: About F-BASIC
about.content: Family Basic (F-BASIC) is a programming language for the Family Computer (Famicom). This emulator provides a complete development environment to write and execute F-BASIC programs with authentic syntax and behavior.

gettingStarted.title: Getting Started
gettingStarted.content: Start by exploring the Family Basic IDE to write your first program. Use the navigation bar above to access all available tools and features.
